preference_alignment_score.name: preference_alignment_score
preference_alignment_score.description: Measures the degree of similarity in Ana and John's initial vacation preferences.

final_agreement_score.name: final_agreement_score
final_agreement_score.description: Evaluates how much the final decision aligns with each agent's preferences.

decision_iterations.name: decision_iterations
decision_iterations.description: Tracks the number of rounds of discussion or negotiation it took to reach a consensus.

influence_score.name: influence_score
influence_score.description: Measures the influence each agent had on the final decision.

compromise_index.name: compromise_index
compromise_index.description: Measures how much each agent had to compromise from their initial preferences to reach the final decision.

satisfaction_score.name: satisfaction_score
satisfaction_score.description: Measures each agent's satisfaction with the final vacation plan.

time_to_decision.name: time_to_decision
time_to_decision.description: Measures the amount of time it took to reach a final decision.

communication_efficiency.name: communication_efficiency
communication_efficiency.description: Tracks the number of communications required to reach the decision.

flexibility_score.name: flexibility_score
flexibility_score.description: Measures how willing each agent is to adapt or change their preferences during the decision-making process.

conflict_resolution_rate.name: conflict_resolution_rate
conflict_resolution_rate.description: Tracks the frequency and resolution of conflicts or disagreements between agents.

leadership_influence.name: leadership_influence
leadership_influence.description: Identifies if one agent emerges as the leader or dominant decision-maker in the group.

group_cohesion_index.name: group_cohesion_index
group_cohesion_index.description: Measures how well Ana and John work together as a team to reach a consensus.
